PrintDuration.Name: {carrierName} - Increased PrintParcel Duration
PrintDuration.NrqlQuery: SELECT average(duration) FROM Transaction where name = 'WebTransaction/WCF/XLogics.BlackBox.ServiceContracts.IBlackBoxContract.PrintParcel' and PrintOperation like '%Create%' and CarrierName = '{carrierName}' facet appName

ErrorRate.Name: {carrierName} - Increased Error Rate
ErrorRate.Description: Faceted Error Rate Percentage alert for {carrierName}
ErrorRate.NrqlQuery: SELECT percentage(count(*), where ExitStatus = 'Error') FROM Transaction WHERE name like '%.PrintParcel' AND CarrierName = '{carrierName}' facet appName
